alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 14 at 3:27AM AKDT until May 16 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT AKDT MONDAY NIGHT FOR DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR DELTANA AND TANANA FLATS... * AFFECTED AREA...Deltana and Tanana Flats. * TIMING...12 PM Sunday to 12 AM Monday night. Marginal overnight recovery Sunday night through Monday morning. * WINDS...Southeast 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 21 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower to mid 60s. * IMPACTS...Rapid Ignition, growth and spread of fires are possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
